exposurecompensation: -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
fileformat: Still Images: JPEG, RAW Movies: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, MOV Audio: Linear PCM
whitebalance: Auto Cloudy Flash Fluorescent Incandescent Manual Preset white balance Shade Sunlight
